title: Google\Cloud\Batch\V1\LifecyclePolicy\ActionCondition
name: ActionCondition
description:
Conditions for actions to deal with task failures.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.batch.v1.LifecyclePolicy.ActionCondition

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.exit_codes
params.description: Exit codes of a task execution. If there are more than 1 exit codes, when task executes with any of the exit code in the list, the condition is met and the action will be executed.

methods.name: getExitCodes
methods.description:
